actions.name: Talons
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) slashing damage.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.desc: (3/Day)The stryx casts the comprehend languages spell, requiring no material components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability.

special_abilities.name: False Appearance
special_abilities.desc: While the stryx keeps its beak closed and doesn't speak, it is indistinguishable from a normal owl.

special_abilities.name: Flyby
special_abilities.desc: The stryx doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

special_abilities.name: Keen Hearing and Sight
special_abilities.desc: The stryx has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or sight.
